articles.description: The Phoenix Suns take on the Milwaukee Bucks in the best-of-seven NBA Finals series to see who will lift the Larry O'Brien trophy.
articles.content:
The Milwaukee Bucks and the Phoenix Suns will battle it out for the 2021 NBA title
After a long but entertaining season, the NBA Finals are finally here.

articles.title: Finally back in Toronto, Blue Jays top Royals - Reuters
articles.description: Bo Bichette hit a two-run home run, Teoscar Hernandez had a solo shot and the Toronto Blue Jays won their true home opener Friday night, beating the Kansas City Royals 6-4.
